long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This link saver can read which tab you're in and therefore save the link to that tab for future ease-to-use. At the same time you can also put in the exact links you want to save with the provided input field. If you at some point want to delete everything, just double click the delete button. It is as easy as that!
